subject: Football
lead_paragraph: San Diego’s Darren Sproles, who missed all of last season after breaking his left leg on a punt return in a preseason game, carried seven times for 63 yards and caught four passes for 36 yards last night, but the host Chargers lost to Seattle, 24-16, in the preseason opener for each team.The Seattle backup quarterback Seneca Wallace threw a 17-yard touchdown pass and was 17 of 25 for 191 yards, with one interception. Shaun Alexander had two carries for 4 yards for Seattle, and LaDainian Tomlinson did not suit up for San Diego.
